text: Indira Stefanianna (born Indira Stefanianna Christopherson; December 15, 1946), also credited as Indira Danks, Stefanianna Christopherson, and Indira Stefanianna, is an American singer and actress. She is best known for her role as the original voice of Daphne Blake on Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! during its first season in 1969. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:Singers from California
title: Indira Stefanianna
